description: This file defines a React hook 'useApi' that provides a set of high-level API methods for interacting with a backend server. It encapsulates an axios instance with default configurations and exposes functions to upload files, trigger backend jobs, fetch job/runs/scripts data, and download results, all tailored for a specific API structure.

methods.name: useApi()
methods.description: Provides a configured axios client and API methods for backend interaction, dynamically reads API base URL from environment variables.
